data.meta_description: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan met during the shoot of 'Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke' and got married in 2007. Amidst their separation rumours, let’s take a look at the timeline of their relationship.
data.text:
The first meeting

Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan met for the first time on the sets of ‘Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke’ in 2000.

The budding friendship

Aishwarya and Abhishek went on to work together in ‘Kuch Naa Kaho’. That film further deepened their friendship, but there was no romantic spark between them.

The turning point

While working on the film 'Umrao Jaan' in 2006, Abhishek realised his feelings for Aishwarya had deepened beyond friendship​.

The proposal

Abhishek proposed to Aishwarya in 2007 during the premiere of their film 'Guru' in Toronto.

The grand wedding

Aishwarya and Abhishek tied the knot in a grand wedding ceremony on April 20, 2007.

The separation rumours

Recently, Abhishek-Aishwarya’s separation rumours took a new height as the couple made separate entries at the Ambani wedding festivities last month.

Professional successes

Both Aishwarya and Abhishek are considered to be successful actors. Aish was last seen in ‘Ponniyin Selvan: I and II’, while Abhishek will be next in SRK starrer ‘King’.
